channel.title: Belkin portforward help needed!
channel.description:
Ok so I know my default gateway [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa303/nachomanmikesta/portforwardgateway.jpg[/img]
I type it in the Mozilla Firefox URL Address and I go to log-in [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa303/nachomanmikesta/portforwardlogin.jpg[/img]
I type admin as the password and I get this [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa303/nachomanmikesta/portforwardloginerror.jpg[/img]
I don't know what the password is so i leave the password field blank and it logs me in I get this as my navigation on the left [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa303/nachomanmikesta/portforwardnavigation.jpg[/img]
This is what I see if I click Virtual Servers under Firewall (looks closest to Applications and Gaming) [IMG]http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa303/nachomanmikesta/portforwardhelp.jpg[/img]
What do I do now?

item.title: Belkin portforward help needed!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I already did that.
I need help on portforwarding not firewall exceptions.

Edit: Would this be it?

Well?

Read full topic

item.title: Belkin portforward help needed!
item.dc:creator: @l3lack_r4nge1 l3lack r4nge
item.description:
@l3lack_r4nge1 wrote:

well can player go to ur server play? if
can don’t do anyithing can’t
first go Open Network & Internet Connections. Right click on the connection you’re using to connect to the internet and click properties. Open the Advanced tab and click on firewall settings. Open the Exceptions tab and at the bottom you should see a button “Add Port”.
Click on it, and add your server name or whatever you want it to be at the Name field.
At the Port number fill in 43594.
And make sure the TCP box has been checked.
that post was from mod of ikiliki

Read full topic
